lines.speaker: Aric
lines.text: Halt. You're entering Preserver-monitored territory. State your purpose.

lines.speaker: Aric
lines.text: A Mnemonic Architect. The Curator warned us one might come.

lines.speaker: Aric
lines.text: A word of advice: the Frontier is not the Settled Lands. Be careful what you remember into existence.

trigger: Second encounter — after first god recall
location: Any Frontier zone (ambient trigger, post-first recall)

lines.speaker: Aric
lines.text: You recalled a god. I felt it — we all did.

lines.speaker: Aric
lines.text: Does being stronger make you right? Honest question.

lines.speaker: Aric
lines.text: Architect. I need to talk to you. Not fight — talk.

lines.speaker: Aric
lines.text: I was given orders to stop you. These are those orders.

lines.speaker: NARRATION
lines.text: Aric sets his crystal gauntlet on the ground.

lines.speaker: Aric
lines.text: I'm choosing not to follow them.

location: The Undrawn Peaks — Crystalline Fortress Gate (20, 35)

lines.speaker: Aric
lines.text: The Curator is wrong about the First Memory. Crystallizing it won't preserve the world — it will kill it.

lines.speaker: Aric
lines.text: Three floors. The Gallery of Moments. The Archive of Perfection. The First Memory Chamber.

lines.speaker: Aric
lines.text: Your four recalled gods are weakening the crystal from outside.

trigger: Endgame Bloom — Aric at Fortress Gate (Scene 11)

lines.speaker: Aric
lines.text: Curator. The Gallery subjects are waking up. They're confused but alive. Someone needs to help them adjust.
